title: Blazin Pizza CO.
description: An interactive and responsive Pizza Store application that grants members points for the money they spend. The user can later use these points to redeem a free medium pizza. Also has a guest option where the point system is not utilized.

title: Konney TM
description: An event manager app that lets the user to set up and keep track of events. It has an interface for creating people, venues and setting up events that are based on a certain venue and has certain people invited to them.

title: Seneca Bookstore
description: An interactive, native-app-like bookstore that allows you to search books by title and sort them in a chosen order. It has all the books categorized under authors and genres, which the user may navigate through the UI.
